objectives.title: Professional Objectives
objectives.description: I'm looking for a frontend development opportunity where I can contribute to product development, grow as a developer, and continue building intuitive, efficient, and user-centered web applications.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: Frontend Developer focused on building complete, user-centered web applications. I specialize in React, TailwindCSS, and Supabase, creating modern UIs with solid logic, clean structure, and good performance. I enjoy crafting products from scratch, where functionality and design go hand in hand. My latest project, TuneBridge, is a full-featured social platform for musicians, including real-time chat, custom profiles, and content sharing — all built independently using modern tools. I value clean, maintainable code, thoughtful UX, and continuous learning. I'm also quick to adopt new technologies when needed.

tuneBridge.title: TuneBridge
tuneBridge.description:
TuneBridge is a social network designed for musicians. Users can create personal and group profiles, share posts, chat, and showcase or discover music projects. The platform encourages collaboration and community building among artists.

Developed with Vite, React.js, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, and React Query, TuneBridge offers real-time chat, project and group management, and a modern, responsive interface. Musicians can easily connect, share their work, and collaborate on new projects in a dedicated online space.
tuneBridge.stack: Vite · React · Tailwind CSS · Supabase · React Query

highlights.four: Custom profile editing and user interaction
highlights.five: Responsive design and smooth UI experience

vestigio.title: Vestigio Restauraciones
vestigio.description:
Vestigio is the website of my furniture restoration business. It presents my work through curated photo galleries and bilingual descriptions (English and Spanish). The site is lightweight, responsive, and customized to reflect the elegance and craft of the restoration process.

Built with semantic HTML, modular CSS, and vanilla JavaScript, the site includes subtle animations, responsive layout, and localized content for a professional online presence.

highlights.four: Fully static website hosted on GitHub Pages
